name: Not much of a Litter Ally
name_original: Not much of a Litter Ally
description:
Not much of a Liter Ally takes place in a highly trafficked undefined park around the 1950s. 

You must stop the citizens who try to throw their garbage on the sidewalk instead of the dumpster, catching it before it hits the ground and giving them a good slap to get some extra score.

This game was made for the 2022 LATAM Game Jam

Controls:

Left mouse click: Slap/Pick up trash

Credits:

  • Patricio Romero  - Programming
  • Matias Cabrera - Design and Narrative
  • Benjamin Del Rio - Art and Voice Acting
  • Diego Gajardo - Music and Sound Design
  • Gabriel Alvarez - Design
